comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Triberg Waterfalls – Then and Now (100+ years later) Located in the state of Baden-Württemberg, within the famous Black Forest, the Triberg Waterfalls are among the tallest waterfalls in Germany – and are likely the most famous. "Triberg Falls (2007)" by J Kurittu       "Waterfall (c.1880)" by Carl Curman

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Thank you for helping us locating this beautiful waterfall and thus contributing with valuable information to our knowledge on Carl Curman's photos! I have now - with som delay - made the changes. 
/Anna B
